author: coffee-cogs
install_msg: Thanks for installing :') Come make pull requests over at my GitHub! https://github.com/coffeebank/coffee-cogs
name: pinshare
short: Make pinned messages communal! Let people add/remove their own blurbs to a message.
description: Make pinned messages communal! Users can add and remove their contributions to a pinned message at any time.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
